name: RootNote
description:
In RootNote you play as Toot, a poor spriggan who has lost his soul. Journey through the woods to find the evil Wendigo that claimed it, and defeat it in the musical battle of the century!

  • Press up to FIVE buttons with accuracy to progress!
  • Story mode!
  • Infinite mode!
  • At least 7 different enemies!
  • XBox controller support!
  • Other controller support, if you know the buttons!
  • Music!
  • Sound!
  • Pictures!
  • GAMEPLAY!

Download the game today and progress through the story! Beat it and then try endless mode. Compare the level you reach with your friends! Use exclamation marks!
